{{Description|The location of a Sacred Seal that contains some energy. Collect enough of these Seals to allow the long-forsaken Primal Obelisks to undergo some changes...|[[Map]] description}}
'''Sacred Seals''' are items in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret. Each is marked with a single character from the [[Deshret Script]].

They are used to restore [[Primal Obelisk]]s and can be marked on the map to show up at the {{Icon|Sacred Seal}} icon.
